amendment.description: An amendment numbered 20 printed in Part B of House Report 118-602 to reduce the salary of Tracy Stone-Manning, Director of the Bureau of Land Management, to $1.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 145 - 268, 1 Present (Roll no. 385).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 145 - 268, 1 Present (Roll no. 385).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
